name: itk-wasm
description: High-performance spatial analysis in a web browser, Node.js, and reproducible execution across programming languages and hardware architectures.

scripts.build: pnpm build:tsc && pnpm build:bundle && pnpm build:minBundle && pnpm build:workerBundle && pnpm build:workerMinBundle && pnpm test:buildTestPipelines:emscripten && pnpm test:bindgenTestPipelines:typescript
scripts.cypress:runChrome: pnpm exec cypress run --config defaultCommandTimeout=8000 --browser chrome
scripts.cypress:runFirefox: pnpm exec cypress run --config defaultCommandTimeout=8000 --browser firefox
scripts.cypress:runFirefox:ci: pnpm cypress:install && pnpm exec cypress run --config defaultCommandTimeout=8000 --browser firefox
scripts.start: pnpm build:workerBundleForTesting && cd test/pipelines/typescript && pnpm build && pnpm start
scripts.test:wasi: pnpm test:buildTestPipelines:wasi && pnpm test:runTestPipelines && pnpm test:bindgenTestPipelines:python
scripts.test: pnpm test:lint && pnpm test:testPipelines && pnpm test:node && pnpm test:bindgenTestPipelines:python && pnpm test:browser:chrome && pnpm test:browser:firefox
scripts.test:browser: pnpm run test:browser:chrome && pnpm run test:browser:firefox
scripts.test:testPipelines: pnpm test:buildTestPipelines:emscripten && pnpm test:buildTestPipelines:wasi && pnpm test:runTestPipelines
scripts.test:bindgenTestPipelines:typescript: node src/itk-wasm-cli.js -b emscripten-build -s ./test/pipelines/ bindgen --package-version 1.0.0 --package-name test-pipelines --package-description "Exercise interface types for bindgen"
scripts.test:bindgenTestPipelines:python: node src/itk-wasm-cli.js -b wasi-build -s ./test/pipelines/ bindgen --interface python --package-version 1.0.0 --package-name test-pipelines --package-description "Exercise interface types for bindgen"
scripts.prepublishOnly: pnpm build:tsc && node ./src/update-versions.cjs && pnpm build:bundle && pnpm build:minBundle && pnpm build:workerBundle && pnpm build:workerMinBundle

author: Insight Software Consortium
